Reference
=========

anchor_ is text

.. _anchor:

* list

  * l2

* list2

citation [cit]_,

like cit_.

Link 1 - `link1`_.

Link 2 - `link 2`_.

[#]_ is a reference to footnote 1,

and [#]_ is a reference to footnote 2.

section
-------

subsection
~~~~~~~~~~


.. [cit] here.
.. [#] This is footnote 1.
.. [#] This is footnote 2.
.. _LL: https://kjggjhh.com
.. _link1: https://www.link1.com
.. _link 2: https://link2.com
